body.name: Nerlion Sling Bag for Men Waxed Canvas Crossbody Bag Sling Bakcpack Chest Bag Water Resistant Shoulder Bag Casual Daypack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 29 mins
features: Waxed Canvas Sling Bag: This good looking bag is made of water resistant canvas material and genuine leather, handcrafted by skilled craftsmen, which make the bag durable in use and rich in looks.
Crossbody Bag: Functional bag with a compact, yet spacious on the inside design. It has sufficient pockets providing ample organization for an everyday use as a take it everywhere bag.

Keep Everything in Order: Size is 7.4*5.5*10.6Inch; Weight: 0.56KG. It can fit 9.7 Inch Pad. The adjustable shoulder strap can be connected with the left or right ring at the bottom for your preference, so that it is convenient to wear on your left or right shoulder.
Sling Backpack: Comes with 2 straps so you can use it as crossbody bag, shoulder bag or sling backpack. There is also a carrying handle at the top of the bag.

Stylish Chest Bag for Men: Great for college, working, dating, shopping and traveling in daily life. It can also be carried for outdoor activities, such as running, cycling, camping, etc. It is a great gift for your friends and family. THIS ITEM IS NOT INTENDED FOR USE BY CHILDREN 12 AND UNDER.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this little bag. It’s smaller than I envisioned, but still works. I wish they’re use the same style and make a slightly larger one, but keep everything the exact same otherwise. It’s everything I wanted in a sling/backpack. The material is a hard rugged waxed canvas and it’s top notch. The colors of everything blend perfectly and beautifully together and I like the arrangements of pockets. It’s very lightweight but durable and it was packaged quite well. It will go with me everywhere! I am a backpack fanatic and this forces me to go minimum, but I’m willing. PERFECT for a small everyday carry. I’m addicted. Should they use the same pattern to make a medium size, I’m all in! It’s very stylish. I can’t say enough about it. If you are looking for a size just big enough to carry a few items for a day out, this may be the one for you. The green is my favorite color and it’s a good shade of green to give it that vintage, rustic look. As soon as it came up on my search at Amazon, I knew it was the one for me! I truly hope it holds up through use ahead. I will put it to the test and we shall see. I’m so excited to make this my everyday carry. OK, I’m done with the review. Now to spend time with my favorite bag. 😊❤️Update-I have been using this sling bag every day since the day it arrived. I know this is “the one” for me because normally I switch bags about every week. I’m not a purse girl by any means, but the rugged back pack has alway been my thing. I luv, luv, luv this bag. It’s holding up so far so good. I mainly use it as a sling. I’d still like to see the exact same style but in a slightly larger size. It makes for a light bag, so stylish and just fun to have wherever I go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag is super functional it has lots of pockets for organization and the main pocket completely opens up! The straps are adjustable and you can make it a cross body or back pack style. Love the color as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much room and so many pockets! Perfect for a man or a woman!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is one of the most versatile bags. I know it is labeled for a man, and appearance-wise it definitely could be used by a man; however, it has so many pockets and storage that it would be absolutely perfect as a shoulder bag or mini backpack purse for a woman, too.STORAGE CAPACITY: It has 4 zippered pockets on the front. All of them are excellent in size, with even the smallest front one fitting a full-sized smartphone with room for more items -- and even this one is deep enough that if I didn't want to zip it and use it as a slip pocket for my phone (for easy access) it would still seat very securely into the pocket without risk of falling out. Two of the larger compartments can unzip almost a full 270 degrees for full access to the compartments if needed (I prefer to just partially unzip to use as a purse, but the potential is there). One of the horizontal pockets it very deep, but the zipper is fairly short horizontally, so it fits a cell phone, but wider items won't be able to fit through the zipper -- but this is just one of the pockets. The bag is very wide on the bottom, so lots of room to expand, which increases its capacity. I can't quite fit a large iPad in the main compartment, but I can fit an e-reader and a smaller tablet without problem.On the back there is a very deep, padded compartment. Its location makes it secure against your body (great place for wallet or phone), but it has easy access as it isn't zippered but rather closes with a snap flap. It is also large enough for a phone and an e-reader or small tablet.STRAPS: So many options. There are 3 straps, and they are each fully removable. There is a single wide woven strap that is very comfortable to use over the shoulder. It has a 3-prong attachment at the top and can be attached at the bottom side for right or left shoulder. There are also 2 fully removable backpack straps that are fully adjustable and have great amounts of length if needed. They can be used together and attached at the top sides or you can attach one or both at the top center -- depending on your comfort. You can also remove all 3 and use the handle to carry.MATERIAL: From a distance this has more of a leather appearance, but it is a waxed canvas. Up close, and to the touch, the canvas is obvious but very nice looking. Water beads on it and even after several minutes was not absorbed into the material. There is also nice detailing with tan stitching (different shade than the canvas material) and leather zipper pulls. Overall, it has a pretty high-quality appearance to it and seems pretty rugged and durable.No issues or concerns with this bag. Lots of options for storage and really offers a huge amount of space for its smaller outward appearance and without being a huge, bulky bag. Also, excellent options for carrying it, so very comfortable to wear. Has a look that a man could carry without issue, but also suitable for a woman. High marks all the way around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but a bit small
reviews.reviewText: My original order was never delivered, and I was very disappointed because I liked the look of it. I came across the same exact bag on temu for a lot less and it is a good little bag, but for me it is a bit small im a big guy and all though it does fit well it is smaller than I expected . the dimensions are posted, so I recommend you get a measuring tape and see if it works for you before you order it, the bag is nice and sturdy. The zippers feel good. The pockets are deep but just not too wide or long. Definitely well-made and worth what they’re asking for here. So if you’re looking for a smaller compact, well-made bag, I do recommend,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but durable backpack, love the waxed canvas and khaki color
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this strictly for carrying my camera around during shoots, and a lens, maybe a wallet. It is a tad smaller than I hoped for, my tablet does not fit inside (I have a Samsung 7.1 inch tablet), so I am not sure whose brand the video/picture shows as fitting in the backpack.That being said, the overall quality of the backpack is excellent. The straps are heavy duty cotton, the zippers are heavy metal, even if the teeth are not. I like the leather straps at the end of the zipper, makes it easier to zip and unzip. I like that the flap protects the mesh back pocket and the strap goes all the way around the backpack (good security). Although the safety buckle is in the back of the strap, backside ofo the backpack, it is not too easy to open.I was concerned that such a marvelous backpack did not have metal latches for the loops, however, I checked my laptop bag (which I have had for years and carried everywhere) and both bags have the same kind of durable silicone latch hook and the loops are also heavy duty silicone. My laptop bag has lasted all these years, I expect this backpack to live up to the company high standards as well. The interior lining is strong nylon, seems to be waterproof. Excellent interior pockets to keep documents private.This backpack is well constructed, and seems to be able to take a beating.Great backpack for my camera/shoots.Overall, I am very pleased with the quality, hence rated it 5 stars, although I have the two concerns.
